title: User Signup with Valid Data
description: Verify that the user can successfully sign up with valid email, password, and profile information using Supabase Auth integration.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page
Enter a valid email, strong password, and required profile information
Submit the signup form
Verify account creation success message and user is logged in

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Ensure that a registered user can log in successfully using correct email and password credentials, establishing a valid session.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input registered user email and correct password
Click login button
Verify user is redirected to the dashboard and session is established

title: User Login Attempt with Incorrect Password
description: Verify that login fails with an informative error message when an incorrect password is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter registered email with incorrect password
Click login button
Verify error message indicating invalid credentials and no session is created

title: Subscription Plan Selection and Feature Access
description: Test that users can select available subscription plans (Basic, Business, Premium) and access corresponding features based on plan entitlements.

steps.description: Log in as a new user
Navigate to the subscription plans page
Select a subscription plan and complete payment (mocked)
Verify the selected plan is activated and restricted features open according to plan
Attempt to access features not available in the chosen plan
Verify access is denied or prompts user to upgrade

title: Record Financial Transaction via WhatsApp
description: Ensure that users can record financial transactions through WhatsApp natural language messages and transactions are categorized correctly.

steps.description: Send a financial transaction message to the WhatsApp agent in natural language
Verify the transaction is parsed correctly with amount, category, and date
Verify that the transaction appears in the user's financial records dashboard

title: Export Financial Records in Paid Plans
description: Verify that users subscribed to Business or Premium plans can export financial transactions as CSV or spreadsheets and Basic users cannot.

steps.description: Log in as a Basic plan user
Attempt to export financial data
Verify export functionality is unavailable or informs user to upgrade
Log in as a Premium plan user
Export financial data to CSV and spreadsheet formats
Verify exported files contain correct transaction records and format

title: Web Search Agent Returns Summarized Citations
description: Test that the Web Search agent can perform research queries over permitted sources and returns summaries with correct citations and links.

steps.description: Send a web search query through WhatsApp to the agent
Verify that the response contains a meaningful summary
Verify citations and source links are included and valid

title: Scrape Agent Generates Reports in CSV/JSON from Permitted APIs
description: Verify that the scrape agent accesses allowed external APIs only, and produces accurate detailed reports in CSV and JSON formats.

steps.description: Trigger the scrape agent with a valid data source request
Verify the agent accesses data only from permitted APIs
Verify generated reports are available in both CSV and JSON with correct data

title: Scheduling Sub-Agent Syncs with Google Calendar
description: Validate that the scheduling agent correctly interacts with Google Workspace Calendar, adding and modifying events with proper syncing.

steps.description: Use WhatsApp to request event creation with date/time
Verify event is created in Google Calendar accurately
Modify the event through WhatsApp
Verify calendar reflects the updated event details

title: Video Generation Agent Enforces Quota Limits
description: Ensure that video generation sub-agent allows video clip creation within quota limits defined by subscription plans and blocks overuse.

steps.description: Authenticate as a Basic, Business, then Premium plan user respectively
Request video generation until quota is reached for each plan
Verify video clips are created up to quota and further requests are denied with message

title: Proactive WhatsApp Messaging Respects 24-Hour Window
description: Test that proactive messages sent by the agent comply with the WhatsApp policy 24-hour customer messaging window and template message approvals.

steps.description: Attempt to send proactive message inside 24-hour window after customer message
Verify message sends successfully without template
Attempt to send proactive message outside 24-hour window with approved template
Verify message sends successfully using approved template
Attempt to send proactive message outside 24-hour window without approved template
Verify message is blocked and appropriate error or warning is given

title: Real-Time Notifications and Alerts Trigger Correctly
description: Verify that notifications and alerts (bills, tasks, events) are sent in real-time within the app and WhatsApp according to user data and schedules.

steps.description: Set upcoming bill and task with notification time
Verify notification appears in the app notification center at scheduled time
Verify real-time WhatsApp notification is received if applicable

title: Data Backup and Restoration for Premium Plan
description: Ensure that data backup follows the 3-2-1 rule and restoration tests confirm complete data recovery for premium subscribers.

steps.description: Perform scheduled backup of user and financial data for Premium plan user
Verify multiple backup copies stored across different media and locations
Initiate a data restoration test from backup
Verify data is fully restored without loss or corruption

title: Support Service Access by Subscription Plan
description: Verify support availability and response times according to the plan: Basic users have no support, Business and Premium users have 24/7 priority support.

steps.description: Log in as Basic plan user and attempt to access support
Verify support options are not available or show no automated/manual support
Log in as Business/Premium user and submit a support request
Verify support ticket is accepted and response SLA timelines are met

title: Data Privacy Compliance: User Opt-In/Out and Consent Logging
description: Validate that privacy features comply with LGPD and GDPR by handling user opt-in/out, registering consents for data processing, and allowing data export or deletion requests.

steps.description: Request opt-in consent from user during signup and record consent
Verify consent is logged with timestamp and user details
Request user data export and deletion via profile privacy settings
Verify data is exported accurately and deletion removes user data properly
User opts out of data processing
Verify that no further data is processed for that user and preferences are respected

title: User Profile Management with Avatar Upload
description: Verify users can upload, update, and remove avatar images in their profiles and changes are reflected correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to user profile page
Upload a valid image file as avatar
Verify avatar is displayed on profile and across UI
Remove or replace the avatar image
Verify avatar updates or resets correctly

title: Dark/Light Theme Toggle and Responsive UI
description: Test that the theme toggle switches UI between dark and light modes instantly and that the UI layout adapts responsively on various devices.

steps.description: Toggle the theme switch from light to dark and back
Verify UI colors, icons, and styles update accordingly
Resize viewport to mobile, tablet, and desktop sizes
Verify layout adjusts properly with sidebar, headers, and components rendered responsively

title: Handling Unauthorized Access to Restricted Features
description: Verify that non-authenticated users or users without sufficient plan entitlement cannot access restricted features or sensitive data.

steps.description: Attempt to access financial data, export, or advanced agent functionality without login
Verify access is denied and redirection to login page occurs
Log in as Basic plan user and attempt to use Premium-only features
Verify features are blocked with appropriate upgrade prompt
